reasoning: Beta thalassemia is an inherited hemoglobinopathy. Global incidence varies by ethnicity: 1-2 per 100k in most populations, up to 5-10 per 100k in Mediterranean, Middle Eastern, and Asian populations. Estimated global average 2-3 per 100k.
source: Vichinsky E. (2005). Advances in the treatment of alpha-thalassemia. Blood Rev. 19(1):33-43
